author: Special Correspondent
text: Noon meal employees are planning to launch an indefinite strike in support of their three-point charter of demands and urging the Chief Minister Jayalalithaa to fulfil the promises made in the election manifesto. K. Pazhanisamy, State president of the Tamil Nadu Noon Meal Employees’ Association, said a decision on the date for indefinite strike would be taken at the association’s State conference at Tirupur on January 8. He said the employees had been drawing a consolidated pay for the past few decades.
title: Noon meal employees plan stir
